core.models module¶

class core.models.Bibtex(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Bibtex object. All information of your publications are represented as this model.

id¶

Defined by django app automatically. AutoField, primary key.

Type

int

title_ja¶

title of your pubilication (Japanese). Check validation rules. (len=512, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

authors¶

authors of this publication. The order is stored in AuthorOrder model. (model=’Author’, through=’AuthorOrder’).

Type

django.db.models.ManyToManyField

book¶

book object in which this paper is published (e.g. {International proceedings, journals, newspapers, …}). (model=’Book’)

Type

django.db.models.ForeignKey

book_title¶

book title including details (e.g. year). (len=512, null=True, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

volume¶

volume number (巻). Before published, ignore this column. (len=128, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

number¶

number of the book (号). Before published, ignore this column. (len=128, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

chapter¶

chapter number (章). Before published, ignore this column. (len=128, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

page¶

page number (章). Before published, ignore this column. Check validation rule. (len=32, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

edition¶

edition (版). Before published or no longer needed to the format of the publication, ignore this column. Check validation rule. (len=128, blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

pub_date¶

date (year, month, date) on which the book is published. If date-info is no needed, set 01 to the date field. (default=”2000-01-01”)

Type

django.db.models.DateField

use_date_info¶

if set True, the date will be displayed. (default: True)

Type

django.db.models.BooleanField

url¶

An URL to PDF or something. (blank=True)

Type

django.db.models.URLField

fund¶

information about research funds (e.g. JST CREST JPMJCR15E2). (len=512, blank=False)

Type

django.db.models.CharField

abstract¶

abstract of the paper.

Type

django.db.models.TextField

tags¶

tag for this publication. (model=’core.Tag’, through=’core.TagChain’)

Type

models.ManyToManyField

is_published¶

set True when this paper has already published. (default=False)

Type

django.db.models.BooleanField

created¶

date and time which this record is created. This column is automatically filled by django app. (auto_add_now=True)

Type

django.db.models.DateTimeField

modified¶

date and time which this object is updated. This column is automatically filled by django app. (auto_now=True)

Type

django.db.models.DateTimeField

owner¶

user who creates this object. This column is automatically filled by django app. (model=’users.User’)

Type

django.db.models.ForeignKey

LANGUAGE_CHOICES¶

choices for an available langauages.

Type

tuple

BIBSTYLE_CHOICES¶

bibtex type.

Var

Type

Description

AWARD

Award

TBA

KEYNOTE

Keynote (Presentation)

TBA

SAMEASBOOK

Same as the Book

TBA
Type

tuple

Parameters

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • language (CharField) – Language. Default language setting for this publication. (choise={‘EN’ or ‘JA’}

  • title_en (CharField) – Title en. Title of your pubilication (Japanese). Check validation rules.(len=512, blank=True)

  • title_ja (CharField) – Title ja. title of your pubilication (Japanese). Check validation rules. (len=512, blank=True)

  • book (ForeignKey to Book) – Book. book title including details (e.g. year). (len=512, null=True, blank=True)

  • bib_type (CharField) – Bib type. If this entry is related to an award or a presentation (not article),set this field.(choose from BIBSTYLE_CHOICES, see note for available choices.)

  • book_title (CharField) – Book title. book title including details (e.g. year).(len=512, null=True, blank=True)

  • volume (CharField) – Volume. volume number (巻). Before published, ignore this column.(len=128, blank=True)

  • number (CharField) – Number. number of the book (号). Before published, ignore this column.(len=128, blank=True)

  • chapter (CharField) – Chapter. chapter number (章). Before published, ignore this column. (len=128, blank=True)

  • page (CharField) – Page. page number. Before published, ignore this column. Check validation rule.(len=32, blank=True)

  • edition (CharField) – Edition. edition (版). Before published or no longer needed to the format of the publication, ignore this column. Check validation rule.(len=128, blank=True)

  • pub_date (DateField) – Pub date. date (year, month, date) on which the book is published. If date-info is no needed, set 01 to the date field.(blank=True) (default: 2000-01-01)

  • use_date_info (BooleanField) – Use date info. if set True, the date will be displayed.(default: False)

  • url (URLField) – Url. An URL to PDF or something. (blank=True)

  • fund (CharField) – Fund. information about research fundings(e.g. JST CREST JPMJCR15E2).

  • abstruct (TextField) – Abstruct. abstract of the paper.(blank=True)

  • memo (CharField) – Memo. note or comment.(blank=True)

  • is_published (BooleanField) – Is published. set True when this paper has already published.(default: False)

  • created (DateTimeField) – Created. date and time which this record is created.This column is automatically filled by django app.(auto_add_now=True)

  • modified (DateTimeField) – Modified. date and time which this object is updated.This column is automatically filled by django app.(auto_now=True)

  • owner (ForeignKey to User) – Owner. user who creates this object.This column is automatically filled by django app.(model=’users.User’)

  • authors (ManyToManyField) – Authors. authors of this publication. The order is stored in AuthorOrder model.(model=’Author’, through=’AuthorOrder’).

  • tags (ManyToManyField) – Tags. tag for this publication. (model=’core.Tag’, through=’core.TagChain’)

LANGUAGE_CHOICES = (('EN', 'English'), ('JA', 'Japanese'))
BIBSTYLE_CHOICES = (('AWARD', 'Award'), ('KEYNOTE', 'Keynote'), ('SAMEASBOOK', 'Same as the Book'))

property title¶

Returns a title of this entry in the default language.

property book_title_display¶

Returns a book title of this entry.

If this enttry has book_title itself, return it. Otherwise, returns a book title of linked book entry.

property book_abbr_display¶

Returns abbribiation text of a linked book. (e.g. (IMWUT 2020))

property bib_type_key¶

Returns bibtex type (key).

Returns

Bitex.BIBTEXSTYLE_CHOICES or Book.STYLE_CHOICES

Return type

str

property bib_type_display¶

Returns bibtex tyepe (display string)

property authors_list¶

Returns a list of linked core.Author objects.

Returns

list of core.Author

property author_order_list¶

TBA

property date_str¶

Returns date in display format.

Returns

str

property date_dict¶

Returns date infomation as dict.

This dict contains month sting
